六十の手習い: (ろくじゅうのてならい) - Never too late to learn
六十余州: (ろくじゅうよしゅう) - 66-odd provinces of old Japan; 60-odd states
六十六部: (ろくじゅうろくぶ) - Buddhist pilgrim (carrying 66 copies of the Lotus Sutra to be left at sites across Japan)
六十四分音符: (ろくじゅうしぶおんぷ) - {music} 64th note; hemidemisemiquaver
六十四卦: (ろくじゅうしけ) - the 64 hexagrams (of the Book of Changes)
六卿: (りっけい) - six ministers (of the six Zhou-dynasty Chinese ministries)
六号記事: (ろくごうきじ) - (yoji) (space) filler; fill-in (in magazines, newspapers, etc.)
六合: (りくごう) - the universe; the cosmos
六国: (りくこく) - Six Kingdoms (of China's Warring States period: Qi, Chu, Yan, Han, Wei & Zhao)
六国史: (りっこくし) - Rikkokushi; the six ancient Japanese historical collections compiled between the Nara and Heian periods
六地蔵: (ろくじぞう) - the Six Ksitigarbhas (one for each of the six realms)
六塩化エタン: (ろくえんかエタン) - hexachloroethane; perchloroethanes
六境: (ろっきょう) - six objective fields of the senses (shape and colour, sound, scent, flavour, physical feeling, and mental presentation)
六大: (ろくだい) - the six elements (earth, water, fire, wind, void, and consciousness)
六大州: (ろくだいしゅう) - the Six Continents
六字大明呪: (ろくじだいみょうじゅ) - great six-syllable mantra ("om mani padme hum")
六官: (ろっかん) - six ministries (of Zhou-dynasty China)
六尺: (ろくしゃく) - (六尺 only) six feet; (六尺 only)   traditional Japanese G-string for men; (esp. 陸尺) palanquin bearer
六尺棒: (ろくしゃくぼう) - wooden pole (often oak), 6 shaku long; shoulder pole
六尺褌: (ろくしゃくふんどし) - traditional Japanese G-string for men
六帯アルマジロ: (ムツオビアルマジロ) - six-banded armadillo (Euphractus sexcinctus); yellow armadillo
六府: (ろっぷ) - the six internal organs (large intestine, small intestine, gallbladder, stomach, san jiao, urinary bladder)
六弗化リン酸リチウム: (ろくふっかリンさんリチウム) - lithium hexafluorophosphate
六弗化硫黄: (ろくふっかいおう) - sulfur hexafluoride
六情: (ろくじょう) - the six emotions (joy, anger, sorrow, pleasure and love, and hatred)
六放海綿: (ろっぽうかいめん) - hexactinellid sponge; glass sponge (any sponge of class Hexactinellida)
六方: (ろっぽう) - the six directions (north, south, east, west, up, and down); hexagonal
六方晶系: (ろっぽうしょうけい) - hexagonal crystal system
六日: (むよか) - sixth day of the month; six days
六日間戦争: (むいかかんせんそう) - Six-Day War; Third Arab-Israeli War (June 5-10, 1967)
六時: (ろくじ) - six o'clock; six periods of a day (morning, midday, afternoon, evening, midnight, late night)
六曜: (ろくよう) - Japanese calendar's six labels, indicating how auspicious each day is
六書: (ろくしょ) - (りくしょ, りきしょ only) the six classes of (kanji) characters; Hexateuch (first six books of the Hebrew Bible)
六月病: (ろくがつびょう) - blues experienced by workplace recruits shortly after beginning work
六月祓: (みなづきばらえ) - summer purification rites (held at shrines on the last day of the 6th lunar month)
六朝: (ろくちょう) - Six Dynasties (of China: Eastern Wu, Eastern Jin, Song, Qi, Liang, Chen); calligraphic style of the Six Dynasties period
六根: (ろっこん) - six sense organs (eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind)
六根清浄: (ろっこんしょうじょう) - (yoji) purification of the six roots of perception
六欲天: (ろくよくてん) - the six domains of the desire realm; the six heavens of the desire realm
六歳臼歯: (ろくさいきゅうし) - six-year molar
六段の調べ: (ろくだんのしらべ) - rokudan (name of a koto composition)
六気: (りくき) - yin, yang, wind, rain, darkness, light; cold, heat, dryness, dampness, wind, fire; six emotions (joy, anger, sorrow, pleasure, love, hate)
六法全書: (ろっぽうぜんしょ) - compendium of laws; statute books; complete book of the Six Codes
六波羅蜜: (ろっぱらみつ) - (yoji) the six virtues (perfections) a Buddha elect practices to attain supreme enlightenment
六派哲学: (ろっぱてつがく) - six schools of classical Indian philosophy
六淫: (ろくいん) - six external causes of illness in traditional Chinese medicine (wind, cold, fire-heat, dampness, dryness, heat of summer)
六甲おろし: (ろっこうおろし) - cold northerly winter wind from the Rokko Mountains
六甲颪: (ろっこうおろし) - cold northerly winter wind from the Rokko Mountains
六白: (ろっぱく) - sixth of nine traditional astrological signs (corresponding to Venus and north-west)
六知事: (ろくちじ) - six administrators of a Zen temple
六神丸: (ろくしんがん) - pill made from various animal ingredients (incl. musk, toad venom, cow bezoars, etc.) used as a cardiac stimulant in Chinese medicine
六神通: (ろくじんつう) - six supernormal powers
六義: (ろくぎ) - six forms of the Shi Jing (genre: folk song, festal song, hymn; style: narrative, explicit comparison, implicit comparison); six forms of waka (allegorical, enumerative, metaphorical, allusive, plain, congratulatory); six principles of calligraphy; six classes of kanji characters
六腑: (ろっぷ) - the six internal organs (large intestine, small intestine, gallbladder, stomach, san jiao, urinary bladder)
六親: (ろくしん) - the six blood relations
六親眷属: (ろくしんけんぞく) - (yoji) all of one's relatives by blood and by marriage; one's kith and kin
六観音: (ろっかんのん) - the Six Forms of Avalokitesvara (one for each of the six realms)
六角レンチ: (ろっかくレンチ) - hexagonal wrench; allen key
六角穴付: (ろっかくあなつき) - hexagon socket head; allen socket head
六角穴付き: (ろっかくあなつき) - hexagon socket head; allen socket head
六角穴付きボルト: (ろっかくあなつきボルト) - hex socket head cap bolt
六角穴付ボルト: (ろっかくあなつきボルト) - hex socket head cap bolt
六調子: (ろくちょうし) - six main gagaku modes (equivalent to A Dorian, B Dorian, E Dorian, D Mixolydian, E Mixolydian and G Mixolydian)
六識: (ろくしき) - six consciousnesses (i.e. functions of the six sense organs: seeing, hearing, smelling, tasting, touching, and reasoning)
六輝: (ろっき) - Japanese calendar's six labels, indicating how auspicious each day is
六道: (ろくどう) - the six realms (Deva realm, Asura realm, Human realm, Animal realm, Hungry Ghost realm, Nakara realm)
六道輪廻: (ろくどうりんね) - (yoji) endless circle of transmigration in the six posthumous worlds
六道銭: (ろくどうせん) - six coins placed in a casket (said to be to pay the fare to cross the River Sanzu)
六部: (ろくぶ) - six copies; Buddhist pilgrim (carrying 66 copies of the Lotus Sutra to be left at sites across Japan)
六重唱: (ろくじゅうしょう) - vocal sextet
六韜三略: (りくとうさんりゃく) - (yoji) two books on the art of war in ancient China; the secrets (essence) of the art of war; secrets of successful life; precepts for living
共: (hoje/amigo) - together , first-person plural (or singular); second or third person plural (implies speaker is of higher status than those referred to)
共に: (ともに) - together/jointly; (often as ...とともに) at the same time/with/as .../including/along with; both
共にする: (ともにする) - to do together; to share; to participate in
共のハンカチ: (とものハンカチ) - handkerchief of the same cloth
